channel.title: [Galkons] Adding orbs for special energy and more

item.title: [Galkons] Adding orbs for special energy and more
item.dc:creator: @darthbonsly darthbonsly
item.description:
@darthbonsly wrote:

After looking at the code for the orbs I had (hp, run, prayer), I found very little evidence in the client as to how it was reading the stats. For now, I’ll go ahead and post what lines I’m stumped on.

String cP = RSInterface.interfaceCache[149].message; cP = cP.replaceAll("%", ""); int currentSpecial = Integer.parseInt(cP);

Obviously these are the variables I need, but I don’t know how to track them down at all…

All help is appreciated, thanks.

Read full topic
